test.name: Processo de reserva de pacote de viagens

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'https://www.hurb.com/br'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
kw.msg: Slept 4 seconds

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'id=CybotCookiebotDialogBodyLevelButtonLevelOptinAllowAll'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=#__next > div.Header_Header__1jiZz > div.hrc-2LOsj > div > div > div.h-91nvuq > div > button:nth-child(2) > span'.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.name: Validar as informações da "Configuração" da viagem
Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'css=body > div.container > div > div.col-md-4.col-sm-4.hidden-xs > div.summary > div:nth-child(7) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div.col-xs-8.col-sm-8.col-md-8.text-right' contains text '7 Noites 1 pessoa por pacote'.

kw.name: Validar as informações do período da viagem
Element Should Contain
